title: Journalist Protection Bill finalized: Shibli
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 10 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Senator Shibli Faraz on Tuesday said the Journalist Protection Bill had been finalized by the Ministry of Information and Human Rights Division.
In a tweet, he said it would soon be submitted to Parliament for approval. “Protecting the rights of journalists and workers is our number one priority,” he remarked.
Shibli Faraz said: “We will strive for the promotion of independent and responsible journalism
